channel.title: Urgent help :)

item.title: Urgent help :)
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Yes it the range x and y cords you make it look like this to move

spawn = 200	3254	3433	0	3254	3434	3254	3434	2	team capes 1

That works for me

item.title: Urgent help :)
item.dc:creator: @Ledgend Ledgend
item.description:
